title: Blue Whales - Manual Detection
---

## Setting up LTSA parameters

-   Open 500Hz LTSA for the drift that is being analyzed.

    -   Change the time being displayed to reflect an hour of data.

        -   For continuous recordings, it should say 1HR.

        -   For Duty cycled data it could vary between .2 and .6HRS

    -   Increase the brightness to 5. Leave default contrast settings

    -   

Triton software was used to create and manually bin blue whale A,B and D call types into 60 minute bins.
